title: Hypertext Story
description: The first project of the quarter, this website was a sort of ice-breaker to introduce myself to the class.

title: Internet Broadsheet
description: Some articles about the internet, formatted like a news site.

title: Transformation Project
description: A quirky little website showcasing transformation with javascript. It features a very interesting button.

title: Art Project
description: I replicated Theo van Doesburg's Mouvement héroïque with p5.js, including an animation and an interactive version.

title: Unplugging
description: A sort of blog about my experience unplugging from technology for a day.

title: Mobile Website
description: A mobile website that takes the user on a scavenger hunt around the WWU campus.

title: Collection Curation
description: A collection of origami models with titles, designers, images, and linked diagrams, ranked by difficulty.

title: Modified ELIZA Chatbot
description: I modified the original ELIZA chatbot from the 1960s to talk like Yoda from Star Wars.

title: Final Project: Button Clicker
description: For my final project, I modified my button clicker project to turn it into a game with more of a storyline and more complex button clicking. Read more in my proposal or watch this video for a more in depth explanation.
